## Description
&#10;&#9;&#9;Yeasts are single-celled fungi. It is an essential Baking Ingredient for making bread.

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Edible:|true|
|Type:|Organism|
|Form:|Solid|
